hero.subtitle: I am Terry
hero.content: a software engineer focusing on building elegant and high-performance client-facing products.

paragraphs: I'm Terry Chen, a full-stack software engineer living in the San Francisco. I've been dedicated to building client-facing products from scratch and scaling them for over 6 years.
With experience in both early-stage and late-stage hyper-growth startups, I enjoy the fast-paced culture of collaborative environments where we move quickly and innovate fearlessly.
Outside of work, I love to travel and explore the good food. I'm also an avid gamer, spending a lot of my free time playing video games.
